title: Australian diary. No. 094
creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
brief_description: Bank machines give preview of automation - the Commonwealth Bank demonstrates electric typewriters and machines to count money, file and sort cheques. Olive growing as a new industry in Australia is shown along with the bottling and oil production at Robinvale. Radio controlled aircraft shows amazing development - a tour of the town of Woomera in South Australia and the Jindivik, pilotless target, being made and tested.
